name: Crab Grabbers
description:
You are a crab fisherman in this crab vs. trash game.

Move the net below your ship left, right, up and down as you capture crabs while avoiding trash and other sea life. The goal is to fill your tank with crab before your net is destroyed by trash. Don't forget to watch where your ship is going too as items tend to also float to the surface!!

This game was created in "Warmup Weekend" for Ludum Dare 33.

(HTML 5 version is in the works)

Minimum Requirements to Play

Windows

  • Windows Vista or later (does work on Windows 10)

Mac / OS X version

  • OS X 10.9 or higher
